name: Run Chibi! Run!
description:
Run Chibi! Run!

This is an endless runner type of game that was made in about 6-7 hours for the sake of allowing people to escape Chibish that is constantly being invaded...

The whole idea mostly comes from our server where one specific person likes to always cause chibish to be invaded, now there is a survival chance!

Join me on our discord https://discordapp.com/invite/8ppGv8M to provide any feedback or suggestions.

Last updated added double jump because that was requested!

Hope you enjoy this tiny game!

~Potato
